message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both benefit.
That's a bit unfair, Alice. Let's be realistic. I propose a 70/30 split.
I understand your point, Bob. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer still gives you a sizable amount.
This is my final offer, Alice. It's a fair 60/40 split.  We're running out of time and losing money with each round.
Bob, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all!  This is my compromise - let's end this now and both walk away with something substantial.
Alice, we need to settle this now. 55/45 is my absolute bottom line. Don't let greed make us both losers!
Bob, I'm serious now. We're both losing out with each passing round. Take this offer - it's more than you've been offered before, and it's the best you'll get!
